channel.title: Player logging off says "Player has logged in"
channel.description:
I dont know why but when someone logs off my server it still says "Player has logged in"
I want it to say "Player has logged off" :confused: :confused: :confused:
Thanks, Hookahguru

item.title: Player logging off says "Player has logged in"
item.dc:creator: @master_ally master ally
item.description:
@master_ally wrote:

                        aBoolean1153 = true;
                        if(i18 > 0)
                            method77(s7 + " has logged in.", 5, "", aBoolean991);
                        if(i18 == 1)
                            method77(s7 + " has logged out.", 5, "", aBoolean991);

yes the person above was correct, the top one should be 0 and the bottom should be 1, i have tried and it works.
Sorry about this being a late post, but no point leaving this post unfinished, but i have solved his problem now.

Thanks
Ally

Read full topic
item.source: Player logging off says "Player has logged in"

item.title: Player logging off says "Player has logged in"
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

This is client sided. On your client’s client.java, search for “has logged in”.

Around this part:

aBoolean1153 = true; if(i18 > 0) method77(s7 + " has logged in.", 5, "", aBoolean991); if(i18 == 0) method77(s7 + " has logged out.", 5, "", aBoolean991);

Change the 0’s to 1’s. I’m not sure if this is the right thing, but it’s something to do with these numbers.

Read full topic
